column2: On any Charisma check against a creature outside of combat, you can choose to Charm it.  The creature must make an Insight check against your roll and if they fail, they become charmed for 1 minute.  A charmed creature will do anything you say regardless of if it goes against their moralcode or is not in their best interest.  You can only charm one creature at a time.
column3: You can Charm a creature for up to 10 minutes.
column4: You can Charm a creature for up to 1 hour and you can Charm up to 5 creatures at a time.
